Title: Aditya Ketkar | Personal Webpage
Name: Aditya Ketkar
Description: Co-founder & CTO @ Telematica.So (YC W22), building future of connected mobility
Previously software engineer at Microsoft and Amazon. Passionate about Sustainability, Space Tech, Sports and Startups
AboutContent: I’m an engineer by day, a sports enthusiast by evening and a hustler always.
If you can’t find me, it’s because I’m cycling, off to a hike, or cheering for my favorite teams!
I am passionate about Space Technology and Human Psychology (though, never studied them formally). A die-hard fan of Elon Musk.
I love the way the concept of "work" has evolved over the past years, and enjoy to travel and work together whenever I can.
WorkContent: Currently, I lead the enginnering team at Telematica

InternShips.name: Computer Vision Center, Universitat Autonoma de Barcelona  ↗

TalksAndBlogsTopContent: I actively attend events to gain and share my knowledge. If you have an event/talk/panel which I can be a part of in any way (to 🗣 or 👂 or both), feel free to reach out at adityaketkar848[ at ]gmail[ dot ]com

Talks.talkDescription: A live and interactive deep dive into frontend-performance optimization with patterns like CSR, SPAs, SSR, SSG, ISG etc (👻). A comparative study of technologies behind Amazon, Gmail, Netflix along with some quick wins for perf improvements
Zero to hero in drafting and maintaining a killer resume, all in 30 mins. A talk for final and pre-final year students and people looking to up their resume game 💪
